name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy AutoFill Forms With 1 Click - Any Website

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save form data and autofill it when needed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview
The Easy AutoFill Forms With 1 Click Chrome extension is designed to simplify repetitive form-filling tasks by saving and autofilling user-provided form data on any website. This extension enables users to store their form input profiles securely and apply them with just one click, making it highly convenient for frequent web users, marketers, and professionals who handle forms daily.

ğŸŒŸKey Features
 âœ… Form Data Saving: Allows users to save data from forms with custom names for easy 
        reference  and reuse.
 âœ… One-Click AutoFill: Autofill saved form data on any website instantly with a single click.
 âœ… Field Selection: Select specific form fields to save or autofill, allowing for customized profiles.
 âœ… Manage Saved Profiles: Easily view, edit, or delete saved form profiles for optimal data                         
       management.
 âœ… Cross-Website Functionality: Supports all websites and forms, offering flexibility for varied               needs.

ğŸŒŸHow to Use
To save form data, open the extension and enter a name for your profile. Select the fields you want to save and click Save. When you return to a similar form, open the extension again, choose the saved profile, and click Autofill to automatically fill in the fields. You can also manage your profiles easily by viewing, editing, or deleting them directly from the popup.

â³ Increase Productivity: Save time on repetitive tasks and focus on what's important.
ğŸ”„ Versatile Form Filler: Handles simple to complex forms, including those with dynamic content.
ğŸ”’ Secure and Private: Your data stays on your device.

ğŸš¨ Privacy and Security
Your privacy is of almost importance. The extension operates locally on your browser, meaning all saved form data is securely stored within your local Chrome storage. It does not transmit or share your data with any external servers.
